body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Faulkner Stone on December 10, 1816. Married to Dorothy G. Ballard Stone in 1827. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850 and 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1850.
